alert.note: Alert for Atoka; Coal (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 2:21AM CDT until July 06 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Coal County in southeastern Oklahoma... West central Atoka County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 220 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Wapanucka, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Atoka, Lehigh, Olney, Phillips, and Boggy Depot Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
